name: Loans; service and custody
text:
The corporation may contract for the service and custody of its loans.  The contract may provide for the payment of fees or charges for the services rendered; provided that the fees or charges shall not exceed the usual, customary, and reasonable charges for the services rendered. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2]
    [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  The administration may contract for the service and custody of its loans.  The contract may provide for the payment of fees or charges for the services rendered; provided that the fees or charges shall not exceed the usual, customary, and reasonable charges for the services rendered. [L 1997, c 350, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
